meanings.definition: A group of broad-spectrum antibiotics used to treat various bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: Doctors prescribed tetracyclines to fight bacterial infections.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended tetracyclines for the infection.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party, but tetracyclines crashed it.
meanings.sent4: In the battle against bacteria, tetracyclines were the fearless warriors.
meanings.sent5: The tetracyclines acted like superheroes, saving the body from harmful bacteria.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of antibiotics derived from a common mold and used to treat a wide range of bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained how tetracyclines are made from mold to treat infections.
meanings.sent2: She took tetracyclines to cure the bacterial infection in her throat.
meanings.sent3: The mold whispered to the bacteria, 'Here comes tetracyclines!'
meanings.sent4: Her body welcomed tetracyclines like an old friend fighting off invaders.
meanings.sent5: The mold transformed into tetracyclines, ready to battle the bacteria.
